|brand = Linksys |model = NSLU |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = 2 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 12/08/2010 |page_start_origon = https://infodepot.fandom.com/wiki/Linksys_NSLU2 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel XScale;IXP420; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = XScale |cpu1spd = 266 <!-- 266 / 400 / 533 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Intel;TE28F640J3C-120; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = ICSI;IC42S16800-7T; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8201CP; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:04:5A
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes |jtag = yes
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.1.77 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = SerComm |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 06/15/2004 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 745883559039 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0001FSCZO |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "G300A-1.0" is silkscreened on the board.
==Links of Interest== *'''[http://www.nslu2-linux.org/ NSLU2-Linux home page]''' :[http://www.nslu2-linux.org/wiki/Info/PhotosOfTheInternals Photos of the internals] ::00:04:5A OUI :[http://www.nslu2-linux.org/wiki/Info/PowerSupply Power supply info] :[http://old.nabble.com/Power-Supply-Tips---Which-is-correct--PLEASE-help.-td17237584.html barrel appears to be 5mm OD, 2.5mm ID] *{{WPLink|NSLU2}} {{•}} [http://ipkg.nslu2-linux.org/optware-ng/ Optware-ng] {{•}} [http://www2.nslu2-linux.org/wiki/pmwiki.php?pagename=Optware/Platforms Platform] :The processor may be a FWIXP420BB or FWIXP420BL. :The ''NEC'' USB controller is a D720101F1.
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|notrecommended}} {{OpenWrtNotice|insufficient}} {{OpenWrtNotice|endsupport|2022|19.07.10}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/linksys/linksys_nslu2 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/linksys/nslu2 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ixp4xx |subtarget = generic |arch = armeb_xscale |support_started_version = 7.06 |current_supported_version = 18.06.9 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
